11131.content: Shortly after the team beat the digimon emperor they started work to repair the digital world when Kens sudden reappearance seem like a trike to everyone but Davis. One of those days when they where all going to go to the digital world after school Kari realized she forgot her digivice in her room and promised to catch up when she got it. On her way home she was deep in thought about Ken and if she can trust him. By the time she got home she decided that the power he received went to his head which made her wonder if she would let power change her. She walks into her room to find her digivice on her desk but on top of it was a ring. she picks it up and realizes that its gatomon's ring that disappeared since she would need to bring it with her Kari decided it would be easier to just where the ring for the walk back. When she puts on the ring she feels this great surge of energy flow thru her body which leads to her...

12.title: Digimon

choices: Answer and see to your duty
Lets Try a differant Renamon start.
123.content:
"All this junk, didn't whoever lived her know what a storage room was." you huffed, pushing a few more overfilled boxes across the floor of your new homes basement.

The flickering bulbs making the tangled mess of old boxes and bits of what you could only assume to be computer parts even less discernible. Leaning back to pop your back, you nearly tripped over a box, falling forwards and onto the troublesome storage container. With a crack and unwanted rip, the box promptly split scattering bits and bobbles all round the floor.

"ouch...ugh oh come on cleaning this up will take hours..." you groaned sitting up only to feel something hard under your hand. Pulling it up the light showed it to be a small yellow and white device, the side open as if for some kind of card reader, and with a tiny window housing a tiny blinking light. "What the?" is all you manage before with a flash the room is lit as though by a flashbang, the light dazzling for a few moments.

Blinking stars from your eyes you find yourself no longer alone. A tall yellow creature now stands above you, its long legs fluffy as though belonging to some animal, with tail and ears to match. Though the body was not so natural, unmistakable curves of hip and bosom, pushed clear against the fur, giving the strange creature an otherworldly beauty as it looked down at you, soft blue eyes moving from the device in your hand to your face, as what looked like a coy smile spread across the creatures lips.

"So, you are to be my tamer then. I am Renamon, call me as such. Now your first duty is to give me your name, after that." the new arrival spoke, her voice a soft sultry thing, as she bent closer licking her lips in an almost seductive manor as one tri fingered paw slide down to stroke your chin, your eyes tracking the way her tail flicked back and forth in apparent enjoyment at your amazed gaze. "Your second duty is to make me the greatest digimon that has ever lived."
123.title: renamon

info.brief_description: Make your favorite digimon girl become the biggest thing of both worlds.
info.description:
Control any female character of this series human or Digimon, simple as that.

Rules:

What you can do:
Breast crush
Butt crush
Sex [even with other girls/giantess]
Feet
Vore
Insertion
Couples
Giant boys [one per girl]
Decent grammar

what you Can't do:
Farting
Toilet
Killing other main characters [unless your a villian]
short chapters.
